content: of the chart keep in mind when you re facing the right side you must slip the first and last stitch purlwise to create a nice chain to be picked up later for the gusset and other slipped stitches must be slipped knitwise to continue the twisted stitch motif cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 heel flap - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - s - & - - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - - & - s - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - s - & - - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - - & - s - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - s - & - rt - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - & - lt - & - s 30 20 10 1 turning heel row 1 k 20 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl 1 p 8 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 knit to one stitch before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl 1 purl to one stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been worked but do not slip first stitch on last purl row knit across the heel that should be 21 stitches pick up 17 stitches from the chain of slipped stitches on the edge of the heel flap work across row 1 of the main chart** or row 7 of the chart depending on where you left off pick up 17 stitches from other side of the heel flap **note now main chart for the instep is to be worked over 31 stitches make sure to omit the first stitch of each row it s grayed out cid 1  3 p o l l y j e a n gusset decrease decrease gusset stitches as follows until 35 stitches remain round 1 knit to 3 stitches before instep k2tog k1 continue chart for instep k1 ssk round 2 knit after gusset decreases are finished continue with chart on instep stockinette on sole until length is approx 2 less than desired finished length ending on either row 11 or 5 of the main chart toe to get ready for the toe you ll have to transfer some stitches knit the first 2 stitches of the sole and transfer them to the instep needle knit across the remainder of the sole until 2 stitches remain transfer those last 2 unworked stitches to the instep needle now you re ready for toe shaping from this point on follow the chart for the instep stitches as for the sole stitches decrease as follows
